item.content:encoded:
Scott Disick can now breathe easy, because it looks like the male model who is demanding a paternity test for little Mason made the whole thing up!

Back in 2009, Michael Girgenti claimed that he and Kourtney Kardashian knocked boots after meeting at a photoshoot. 9 months later, she gave birth to her first son and now the model is demanding a paternity test!

But before we go and call up Maury Povich, a source is pointing out that Michael has had trouble keeping his lies facts straight!

When he first dropped the bombshell he claimed he never heard back from the Kardashian after their steamy affair. However, a month later he gave another interview where he said he received an email from her saying:

"Last night was so much fun. But Scott’s bugging me again, and I don’t know what to do."

So which is it Mr. Girgenti? Did she use and abuse you, or were you two exchanging emails afterwards?

Kourtney and her attorney say she and Michael never exchanged contact information, so this could be a MAJOR hole in his story.

This whole thing has sounded a bit fishy to us from the get-go. Mason looks EXACTLY like Scott and we've never really thought of Kourtney as the cheating type, even if her beau can be a total ass from time to time!

What do U think? Did Michael make the whole thing up??

[Image via WENN.]

item.content:encoded:
Nothing says true love like signing a CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT!

At least it does when you're Britney Spears!

The pop sensation has definitely moved quickly right along from her split with ex-fiance Jason Trawick, as she's been spotted spending a serious amount of time with David Lucado, who joined her during her tour of Las Vegas last weekend!

But what does it take to earn the trust - and HEART - of a musical icon, her team of handlers, and her father Jamie Spears?!

Background checks, and a contract of nondisclosure!

According to insiders:

“Jamie has known David (Lucado) for awhile, and always thought he was a thoughtful, and an all-around good guy. Britney needed someone to keep her company after she and Jason (Trawick) broke up. It had to be a male, because Britney just doesn’t respond as well to females. And remember, she is still under a conservatorship. Before David started spending time with Brit, he had to undergo a background check, and sign a confidentiality agreement, all arranged by Papa Spears. Jamie makes sure if things go south between Jamie and Britney, details about her life wouldn’t be made public. David had absolutely no problem with it, and completely understood why it was being done. David is very protective of Britney, and isn’t dating her for fame. He is very, very patient with her as Britney can be prone to drastic mood swings. He has become a very calming influence in her life.”

Aww! Well, this is EXACTLY what we like to hear!

Brit Brit deserves to be around a guy who is happy being with her for her, not because of her incredible success and financial security!

And it's so refreshing to hear that he's already having such a positive impact on her happiness!

We sincerely hope that their relationship will only continue to grow and deepen from here on out!

All the best, you two!

[Image via FameFlynet Pictures.]

Robert Pattinson and Kristen Stewart have been spending quite a bit of quality time together since the Patz has been back in town. Most recently? At a golf course in Los Feliz!

On Tuesday, the Twilight couple got together during “super twilight time,” says pro shop employee Jeff Lewis. A source saw K.Stew “[walk] into the pro shop around 4pm and [buy] a bucket of balls.”

The source then added:

"After they retrieved their balls, Kristen gave Rob a little kiss and then they headed toward the course. They looked like they were really enjoying themselves.”

AWWW!!

Lewis happened to tweet the sighting as well!

Kristen Stewart and Rob Patterson just came to my golf course at our "super twilight" time.... What does this mean?!?

— Jeff Lewis (@iamjefflewis) March 26, 2013

But if only Lewis hadn't misspelled Rob's last name. Do we know a Robert Patterson??

I'm in a twitter feud with Rob Pattinson fans cuz my phone changed his last name to "PattERson". And I'm SO team Edward. #Misunderstood

— Jeff Lewis (@iamjefflewis) March 27, 2013

Way to go, loyal Twi-Hards!

Now, Robsten! Keep a golfin'!
